home.tagline: AI-powered email outreach platform for modern marketing teams

aiWorkflow.title: AI Agent Workflow
aiWorkflow.description: Let AI agents handle your entire outreach workflow - from research and lead discovery to personalized email generation and campaign management.

findProspects.title: Find leads and email addresses
findProspects.description: Use our powerful lead database and AI-powered search to quickly find qualified prospects with verified email addresses.

emailCampaign.title: Send cold email campaigns
emailCampaign.description: Connect your email account to create, personalize, schedule, and send targeted campaigns at scale with smart automation.

emailEditor.title: Design and personalize emails
emailEditor.description: Create stunning email templates with our drag-and-drop editor. Use AI to generate personalized content that resonates with your audience.

analytics.title: Track performance and analytics
analytics.description: Monitor email opens, clicks, replies, and conversions with real-time analytics. Get insights to optimize your campaigns.

research.title: Market research and insights
research.description: AI-powered market research to understand your target audience, analyze competitors, and discover new opportunities.

campaigns.title: Your Campaigns
campaigns.subtitle: Select a campaign to manage or create a new one

websiteInput.title: Set up
websiteInput.subtitle: Let's start by understanding your business
